com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.model.tracker
Class CxCriteria

java.lang.Object
  com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.model.tracker.CxCriteria

public class CxCriteria
extends java.lang.Object

CxCriteria is the class for artifact search criteria. A CxCriteria is a constraint on a field and respects the format [field] [operator] [value].

    For instance:
  • severity=5
  • open_date>='2005-01-01'
  • etc.
